    • amendIntoTable

      public void amendIntoTable(String tableName, String[] columns, Object[] values, String condition)
      Method for updating the database.
      Parameters:
      tableName - the name of the table to update
      columns - an array of column names to update
      values - an array of values corresponding to the columns
      condition - the condition to specify which rows to update

    • amendIntoOrders

      public void amendIntoOrders(int Order_ID, int Emp_ID, int Stock_ID, Date date, BigDecimal TotalCost, String PaymentStat, Date delivery)
      Method to update orders table.
      Parameters:
      Order_ID - the order ID to update
      Emp_ID - the employee ID to update
      Stock_ID - the stock ID to update
      date - the order date to update
      TotalCost - the total cost to update
      PaymentStat - the payment status to update
      delivery - the estimated delivery date to update

      Parameters:
      product_ID - the product ID to update
      name - the name to update
      quantity - the quantity to update
      unitPrice - the unit price to update
      salePrice - the sale price to update
      supplierId - the supplier ID to update
      aisleNum - the aisle number to update
